EmailTemplate.name: 202012_Americas_GDT_User_Growth_Our_Marketplace_Got_Bigger.GDT Our Marketplace G
EmailTemplate.subject: Immediate access to the only marketplace with $3B+ in quality inventory
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are the only marketplace with over THREE BILLION dollars in quality inventory. What does that mean? This means that price, product images and quality paperwork are available on listings.
Here are some popular features to know about.
- $3B in quality inventory listings. Our goal is to offer what you need and we are constantly bringing on more sellers with inventory. - Transparency for easy checkout. Price, product images and paperwork. - Variety and choices. Shop inventory on over 110 active storefronts from across the globe. - A little something to start. Use promo code FIRSTORDER to get *$100 off your first online order.*
Join for free and gain instant access to shop online. JOIN GODIRECT TRADE FOR FREE <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/account/create/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=USER_GROWTH]]> Stay safe, stay healthy and take care,
Lisa Butters General Manager GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Seller_Wizard]]> (powered by Honeywell)
*Promotion details: $100 discount taken off at checkout, must be on a minimum order purchase of $500 from Honeywell Aerospace Trading’s storefront.
